headline: Canadian Employer Medical Costs to Spike 7.4 Percent in 2025: Aon Report
summary: Aon plc (NYSE: AON), a leading global professional services firm, has released its 2025 Global Medical Trend Rates Report. In Canada, the report forecasted the average medical trend rate for 2025 to be 7.4 percent, up from 5.0 percent in 2024.

headline: Polen Global Growth Q3 2024 Commentary
summary: Polen Global Growth Fund initiated a new position in Oracle and did not eliminate any positions. Volatility re-emerged in the third quarter. Read more here.

headline: Weitz Conservative Allocation Fund Q3 2024 Commentary
summary: The Conservative Allocation Fund's Institutional Class returned +4.82% for the third quarter compared to +6.32% for the Morningstar Moderately Conservative Target Risk Index.

headline: Weitz Partners III Opportunity Fund Q3 2024 Commentary
summary: A strong third quarter for the Partners III Opportunity Fund on an absolute and relative basis, with the Fund's Institutional Class returning +9.38% vs. +6.23% for the Russell 3000.

headline: Weitz Large Cap Equity Fund Q3 2024 Commentary
summary: The Large Cap Equity Fund's Institutional Class posted strong absolute and relative results for the third quarter, returning +7.84% compared to +6.08% for the Russell 1000 Index.
